channel.title: Need help ASAP (have read other posts)
channel.description:
Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Well, that's the error I'm getting. It will load and show the world when I log in only from the localhost though. I had a friend try it but he cant access it at all. His attempts do show up on the cmd and the account is created. My problem is that whenever I try to walk somewhere after one or two clicks on the minimap or in the game field the client crashes and exudes this error. I can use all the panels (i.e. inventory,spell book,quest interface) and I can use all text commands. All if any help is great! (I've tried to give as much detail as possible. :s)
EDIT1: I am using Project Insanity (317) EDIT2: This error happens with EVERY source I try.
Thanks, PJ

On the client I got with the server it says “Error connecting to server” for him

and

When he tries the Moparscape client it will connect and disconnect as before

item.title: Need help ASAP (have read other posts)
item.dc:creator: @PJNoMore PJNoMore
item.description:
@PJNoMore wrote:

Well I did that and I fixed my side of the problem. I can access my world and everything from the localhost BUT I had a friend try to log on and it wont work for him. I have port forwarding ALL set up on my router, my client bridge, and I have my static ip on my laptop. his error is that he can log on, the game interface comes up for a second but it instantly disconnects him. All if any help is appreciated!

Thanks,
PJ

Read full topic
item.source: Need help ASAP (have read other posts)

item.title: Need help ASAP (have read other posts)
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

@echo off title Client "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 exit

Your new run.bat

Read full topic
